code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import Grid from'@mui/material/Grid';import PortfolioBox from'./PortfolioBox';import InputModal from'./InputModal';import Stack from'@mui/material/Stack';import{Typography}from'@mui/material';import{useAppDispatch,useAppSelector}from'../store';import{createUserAction}from'../redux/userAction';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs,Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ShowUser=()=>{const{userList}=useAppSelector(state=>state.userReducer);const dispatch=useAppDispatch();const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);useEffect(()=>{const getUsersAPI=async()=>{try{const res=await fetch("".concat(process.env.REACT_APP_API_ADDRESS_DEV),{method:'GET',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'}});const{result}=await res.json();console.log(result);dispatch(createUserAction(result));setLoading(false);}catch(error){console.error("Error fetching users:",error);setLoading(false);}};getUsersAPI();},[]);if(!userList){return;}if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(_Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{direction:"row",justifyContent:'space-between',sx:{padding:"24px 64px 0 64px"},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{sx:{fontSize:"22px",fontFamily:'Inter',fontWeight:"800",color:"#1A191D"},children:"User List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(InputModal,{})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{container:true,spacing:4,padding:"64px",flexGrow:1,children:userList.map(user=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,lg:2.4,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PortfolioBox,{selecteduser:user})},user.id))})]});};export default ShowUser;
